Articles.Content:
I add in a mod called "super duper engine". An LV-T 30 engine breaks into the hill at the speed of light, wrecking a path for me to claim the hill on.

My hole in the hill.

I put on my grumpy parent hat, take the hole in the hill and I throw it in the bin until everyone learns to share.

NO ONE'S HOLE IN THE HILL! ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

I build another hill.

My hill.

I drop a neutron bomb on Sesni's hill and deploy a Shoop-Da-Whoop-9001 turret on it.

My hill.

IMMA FIRI-

I distract your turret with harmless button quails covered in mirror armor and scavenge its electronics.

My hill with shiny button quails and a Shoop-Da-Whoop-9001 turret hull on it.

I put spiders in the turret hull. They scare your birds away.

My hill.

I put fire in the turret hull to get rid of the spiders.

My hill and turret hull.

I crash an asteroid into the hill.

My hill.

I salvage \_Augustus\_' asteroid and make my own hill.

His and my hills.
I take over the original hill, which is five parallel universes away, in the first thread ever to play this forum game.
I build a hill very different to this one as it is actually Freddy Fazbear's Pizzaria.

I fire an explosive rainbow pony out of a bazooka at your pathetic hill.

My hill.

I go around to the four (current) hills and conquer them all.

My four hills.

I redirect Dres to hit Kerbin. Kerbin is mostly destroyed.

My ruined Kerbin.

I find a planet orbiting another star, that's way better. I claim a hill on it.

My hill.
I steal Zekes' battleships and blow you up. My hill.
I sink the ruins kerbin's hill into the floor for for being FNAF related, then drop a nuke on the planet it is on and take out half of its universe. my half of a universe.

I still have the four hills from the last page! I also plant my flag on the remaining half of the universe

My four hills and half of the universe!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-01-02T16:25:06Z" title="01/02/2015 04:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">January 2, 2015</time> by Sesni**
  
better

I again reset time to the original post. I take the hill by force, then travel forward in time to now to make sure you all never post.

My hill.

I put you in my prison. And build you something.......

![A638DAAA1C6D12233C6059E379A834D34800D933](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/540762067133970013/A638DAAA1C6D12233C6059E379A834D34800D933/)

My prison.

I summon Team America and Nexter. They flood your prison with democracy.

My prison.

the "uncontrollable riot" failure condition happens. SO MANY MARINES!!!!

my prison. which is on the hill.

GO GO GO IT'S A SHARKNADO

I send a sharknado to your prison.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹My shark prison.

I use animal spray. It repels all the sharks and humans from the prison.

My empty prison.

I plant my flag on the prison.

My empty prison.
